TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SqlColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProvider extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Base class for all key store providers. A custom provider must derive from this class and override its member functions and then register it using SqlConnection.RegisterColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProviders(). For details see, [Always Encrypted](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/mt163865.aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SqlColumnEncryptionKeyStoreProviderClass.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract byte[] DecryptColumnEncryptionKey (string masterKeyPath, string encryptionAlgorithm, byte[] encryptedColumnEncryptionKey);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] DecryptColumnEncryptionKey(string masterKeyPath, string encryptionAlgorithm, unsigned int8[] encryptedColumnEncryptionKey) cil managed

Docs.summary: Decrypts the specified encrypted value of a column encryption key. The encrypted value is expected to be encrypted using the column master key with the specified key path and using the specified algorithm.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Byte>. The decrypted column encryption key.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract byte[] EncryptColumnEncryptionKey (string masterKeyPath, string encryptionAlgorithm, byte[] columnEncryptionKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] EncryptColumnEncryptionKey(string masterKeyPath, string encryptionAlgorithm, unsigned int8[] columnEncryptionKey) cil managed

Docs.summary: Encrypts a column encryption key using the column master key with the specified key path and using the specified algorithm.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Byte>. The encrypted column encryption key.
